net.corda.core.contracts

Interface OwnableState

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContractState
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FungibleAsset<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyContract.SingleOwnerState, Cash.State, CommodityContract.State, CommercialPaperLegacy.State, Obligation.State, CommercialPaper.State

    public OwnableState
extends ContractState

    A contract state that can have a single owner.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompositeKey getOwner()
      There must be a MoveCommand signed by this key to claim the amount
      kotlin.Pair<net.corda.core.contracts.CommandData,net.corda.core.contracts.OwnableState> withNewOwner(CompositeKey newOwner)
      Copies the underlying data structure, replacing the owner field with this new value and leaving the rest alone
